SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractLibraryItem
Abstract base implementation of LibraryItem that provides: A generated unique UUID identifier for each item instance. Common price handling with validation. Thread-safe implementations of borrowing and returning operations. A template-method based design that delegates copy-specific logic to subclasses via AbstractLibraryItem.isAvailableInternal(), AbstractLibraryItem.doBorrow(), and AbstractLibraryItem.doReturn().
ActivityReportService
Service class that provides analytical reporting features for library activity.
Admin
Represents the single administrative account within the library system.
BaseFineStrategy
Abstract base class for fine strategies that share common logic.
Book
Represents a Book item in the library system.
Borrowable
Represents the ability of a library item to be borrowed and returned.
BorrowManager
Central manager responsible for handling all borrowing and returning operations in the library system.
BorrowRecord
Represents a single borrowing transaction between a User and a LibraryItem.
BorrowRecord.Status
Enumeration of borrowing states.
BorrowRecordRepository
Defines the contract for persistence operations related to BorrowRecord.
CD
Represents a compact audio disc (CD) in the library collection.
Config
Provides centralized configuration management for the library system.
DefaultSearchStrategy
Default fallback implementation of SearchStrategy.
EmailNotifier
EmailNotifier is a concrete implementation of Notifier that sends notifications to users via email using EmailService.
EmailService
Provides a lightweight email-sending utility backed by Gmailâ€™s SMTP service.
FileBorrowRecordRepository
File-based implementation of BorrowRecordRepository.
FileItemRepository
File-based implementation of ItemRepository that persists LibraryItem objects in JSON format.
FileUserRepository
File-based implementation of UserRepository that persists user data in JSON format.
FileUtils
Central JSON persistence utility for the Library Management System.
FileUtils.RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T>
Polymorphic adapter factory enabling Gson to serialize and deserialize abstract types (like LibraryItem).
FileWaitlistRepository
File-based implementation of WaitlistRepository that persists WaitlistEntry objects in JSON format.
FineContext
A flexible context class that delegates fine calculation and borrow-period rules to a pluggable FineStrategy.
FineReportService
Provides analytical reports related to fines within the library system.
FineStrategy
Strategy interface for calculating fines for overdue library items.
FineStrategyFactory
Central factory for creating FineStrategy instances for all supported library material types (Book, CD, Journal).
ItemManager
The ItemManager class manages all LibraryItem objects in the system, such as books, CDs, and journals.
ItemRepository
Defines the contract for managing persistence operations of LibraryItem objects.
Journal
Represents a LibraryItem of type Journal (periodical or magazine) within the library system.
KeywordSearchStrategy
A broad SearchStrategy that checks all searchable fields using the Searchable.matchesKeyword(String) method.
LibraryItem
Represents a general library item that can be borrowed and searched.
LibraryItemFactory
Factory for constructing LibraryItem objects: Book, CD, and Journal.
LoggerUtils
Utility class for simple file-based logging used across the library system.
LoginManager
Handles authentication operations (login and logout) for the system administrator.
MaterialType
Enumeration representing the various material types available in the library.
NotificationManager
Handles automated user notifications related to borrowed library items.
Notifier
Defines a contract for sending notifications to users within the library system.
ReportExporter
Responsible for exporting library fine-related reports into text or CSV formats.
ReportManager
Acts as a unified facade that centralizes access to all library reporting services.
Role
Represents the role assigned to a User within the library system.
Searchable
Represents the ability of a library item to be searched by keyword.
SearchContext
Context class for executing searches using different SearchStrategy implementations.
SearchStrategy
Defines a flexible contract for implementing different search algorithms on LibraryItem objects within the library system.
TitleSearchStrategy
A SearchStrategy implementation that performs case-insensitive search based on the title of a LibraryItem.
User
Represents a system user within the library management system.
UserManager
Manager responsible for all user-related operations within the library system.
UserRepository
Defines the contract for user persistence operations within the library system.
ValidationUtils
ValidationUtils is a utility class that centralizes all input validation logic used throughout the Library Management System.
WaitlistEntry
Represents a single user's request to borrow a library item that is currently unavailable.
WaitlistRepository
Defines persistence operations for waitlist entries.
